text:
Zocdoc is hiring in NYC!!! We are the largest tech start up in NYC, .NET shop and on the cutting edge of healthcare tech. https://www.zocdoc.com/

We are looking for:

Principal Engineers Senior Software Engineers Front End Engineers Front Eng Engineering Manager Senior Engineering Manager/ EM Product Managers UX Designer/Design Manager IT Security Leadership

Email me at julie.mercurio@zocdoc.com if you are interested with a link to your Linkedin Profile!

Follow us on Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/company/zocdoc Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Zocdoc/
